Parameters: T: An object whose field to get
get(T).Description: Gets the current value held in the field of the given object managed by this updater.

Parameters: T: An object whose field to get and set
getAndSet(T, V).Description: Atomically sets the field of the given object managed by this updater to the given value and returns the old value.
getAndSet(T, V).FullName: public V getAndSet (T obj, V newValue)

Parameters: T: An object whose field to set
lazySet(T,V).Description: Eventually sets the field of the given object managed by this updater to the given updated value.
lazySet(T,V).FullName: public abstract void lazySet (T obj, V newValue)

Parameters: T: An object whose field to set
set(T,V).Description: Sets the field of the given object managed by this updater to the given updated value. This operation is guaranteed to act as a volatile store with respect to subsequent invocations of compareAndSet.
set(T,V).FullName: public abstract void set (T obj, V newValue)

Parameters: T: An object whose field to get and set
getAndUpdate(T,java.util.function.UnaryO.Description: Atomically updates the field of the given object managed by this updater with the results of applying the given function, returning the previous value. The function should be side-effect-free, since it may be re-applied when attempted updates fail due to contention among threads.
getAndUpdate(T,java.util.function.UnaryO.FullName: public final V getAndUpdate (T obj, UnaryOperator<V> updateFunction)

Parameters: T: An object whose field to get and set
BinaryOperator: a side-effect-free function of two arguments
getAndAccumulate(T,V,java.util.function..Description: Atomically updates the field of the given object managed by this updater with the results of applying the given function to the current and given values, returning the previous value. The function should be side-effect-free, since it may be re-applied when attempted updates fail due to contention among threads. The function is applied with the current value as its first argument, and the given update as the second argument.
getAndAccumulate(T,V,java.util.function..FullName: public final V getAndAccumulate (T obj, V x, BinaryOperator<V> accumulatorFunction)

Parameters: T: An object whose field to get and set
updateAndGet(T,java.util.function.UnaryO.Description: Atomically updates the field of the given object managed by this updater with the results of applying the given function, returning the updated value. The function should be side-effect-free, since it may be re-applied when attempted updates fail due to contention among threads.
updateAndGet(T,java.util.function.UnaryO.FullName: public final V updateAndGet (T obj, UnaryOperator<V> updateFunction)

Parameters: T: An object whose field to set
set(T, V).Description: Sets the field of the given object managed by this updater to the given updated value. This operation is guaranteed to act as a volatile store with respect to subsequent invocations of compareAndSet.
set(T, V).FullName: public abstract void set (T obj, V newValue)

Parameters: T: An object whose field to conditionally set
compareAndSet(T,V,V).Description: Atomically sets the field of the given object managed by this updater to the given updated value if the current value == the expected value. This method is guaranteed to be atomic with respect to other calls to compareAndSet and set, but not necessarily with respect to other changes in the field.
compareAndSet(T,V,V).FullName: public abstract boolean compareAndSet (T obj, V expect, V update)

Parameters: T: An object whose field to get and set
BinaryOperator: a side-effect-free function of two arguments
accumulateAndGet(T,V,java.util.function..Description: Atomically updates the field of the given object managed by this updater with the results of applying the given function to the current and given values, returning the updated value. The function should be side-effect-free, since it may be re-applied when attempted updates fail due to contention among threads. The function is applied with the current value as its first argument, and the given update as the second argument.
accumulateAndGet(T,V,java.util.function..FullName: public final V accumulateAndGet (T obj, V x, BinaryOperator<V> accumulatorFunction)

Parameters: T: An object whose field to set
lazySet(T, V).Description: Eventually sets the field of the given object managed by this updater to the given updated value.
lazySet(T, V).FullName: public abstract void lazySet (T obj, V newValue)

Parameters: T: An object whose field to conditionally set
weakCompareAndSet(T, V, V).Description: Atomically sets the field of the given object managed by this updater to the given updated value if the current value == the expected value. This method is guaranteed to be atomic with respect to other calls to compareAndSet and set, but not necessarily with respect to other changes in the field. compareAndSet.
weakCompareAndSet(T, V, V).FullName: public abstract boolean weakCompareAndSet (T obj, V expect, V update)

Parameters: T: An object whose field to conditionally set
compareAndSet(T, V, V).Description: Atomically sets the field of the given object managed by this updater to the given updated value if the current value == the expected value. This method is guaranteed to be atomic with respect to other calls to compareAndSet and set, but not necessarily with respect to other changes in the field.
compareAndSet(T, V, V).FullName: public abstract boolean compareAndSet (T obj, V expect, V update)

Parameters: Class: the class of the objects holding the field
Class: the class of the field
String: the name of the field to be updated
Throws: if the field is of the wrong type
if the field is not volatile
with a nested reflection-based exception if the class does not hold field or is the wrong type, or the field is inaccessible to the caller according to Java language access control
newUpdater(java.lang.Class<U>,java.lang..Description: Creates and returns an updater for objects with the given field. The Class arguments are needed to check that reflective types and generic types match.
newUpdater(java.lang.Class<U>,java.lang..FullName: public static AtomicReferenceFieldUpdater<U, W> newUpdater (Class<U> tclass, Class<W> vclass, String fieldName)

ClassDesc: A reflection-based utility that enables atomic updates to designated volatile reference fields of designated classes. This class is designed for use in atomic data structures in which several reference fields of the same node are independently subject to atomic updates. For example, a tree node might be declared as Note that the guarantees of the compareAndSet method in this class are weaker than in other atomic classes. Because this class cannot ensure that all uses of the field are appropriate for purposes of atomic access, it can guarantee atomicity only with respect to other invocations of compareAndSet and set on the same updater.
